title: ImportError: Cannot load backend 'TkAgg' which requires the 'tk' interactive framework, as 'wx' is currently running
body:
Hi, 

When I run the following step, it displays the crop gui, I select the red area to crop, quit and save, the GUI closes, but the terminal remains stuck here: deeplabcut.extract_frames(config_path,'automatic','uniform', userfeedback=False, crop=True)
Config file read successfully.

The extracted frames never appear in the folder. I end up having to type Ctrl C to get out of it in terminal.  In my config.yaml file, I have:
```
# Cropping Parameters (for analysis and outlier frame detection)
cropping: true
#if cropping is true for analysis, then set the values here:
x1: 471
x2: 288
y1: 958
y2: 0
```
These are the values I use when cropping in ffmpeg, but I didn't think the values specified here matter at all since it should pull the values selected from the GUI and use those.  I should note that, anytime I run a step that requires the GUI, like the label frames step, it returns an error saying" ImportError: Cannot load backend 'TkAgg' which requires the 'tk' interactive framework, as 'wx' is currently running." 

To proceed, I type import matplotlib then matplotlib.use('Agg')  and then re-run the deeplabcut step. After doing this, the GUI will appear, but deeplabcut terminal always gets stuck when the gui closes.  Any suggestions? I am using python in conda on Windows 10 computer.
